aboutMe.introduction: I'm Vanessa Sachs, a frontend developer based in Berlin, specializing in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Angular. My passion lies in creating visually appealing and functional user interfaces that enhance the overall user experience. I am dedicated to continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in web development.
aboutMe.moreAboutMe: With a strong focus on user-centered design, I strive to build intuitive, responsive, and engaging web applications. I enjoy collaborating with cross-functional teams to turn complex ideas into elegant solutions. Whether it's developing a new website or improving an existing platform, I am committed to delivering exceptional results.

skills.frontendTechnologiesDescription: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a strong foundation in responsive design.
skills.frameworksLibrariesDescription: Experienced with Angular, Bootstrap, and Material Design for building modern, user-friendly applications.
skills.developmentToolsDescription: Familiar with Git for version control, Scrum for agile project management, and Firebase for backend integration.
skills.apisDescription: Skilled in integrating and developing RESTful APIs to enable seamless data communication.

portfolio.subline: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

join.name: Join
join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

elPolloLoco.name: El Pollo Loco
elPolloLoco.description: A game developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript where you need to navigate and avoid obstacles.

references.heading: What my colleagues say about me

reference1.text: Working with Vanessa on our programming project was a delight. Her humorous and easy-going nature created a positive team environment. Vanessa's ability to maintain a relaxed atmosphere while delivering quality work was truly impressive.
reference1.name: P. Nehlsen

reference2.text: Vanessa consistently demonstrated a high level of dedication and expertise in her work. Her strong team spirit made her a valuable asset to our team. I highly recommend Vanessa.
reference2.name: R. Lochschmidt

contact.contactFormIntro: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
